text: On 3 March 2009, the Sri Lankan national cricket team was attacked by Lashkar- e-Jhangvi gunmen in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan. Six members of the Sri Lanka national cricket team were injured. Six Pakistani policemen and two civilians were killed. title: 2009 attack on the Sri Lanka national cricket team
